code: protected Endpoint createEndpoint(String uri, String remaining, Map<String, Object> parameters) throws Exception {     boolean fixed = false.     if (remaining.startsWith("fixed:")) {         fixed = true.         remaining = remaining.substring("fixed:".length()).     } else if (remaining.startsWith("delim:")) {         remaining = remaining.substring("delim:".length()).     } else {         // lets assume the rest of the string is just a name         // to differentiate different named delimited endpoints         remaining = "".     }     String resourceUri = remaining.     FlatpackType type = fixed ? FlatpackType.fixed : FlatpackType.delim.     FlatpackEndpoint answer = new FlatpackEndpoint(uri, this, resourceUri).     answer.setType(type).     setProperties(answer, parameters).     return answer. }
